entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this morning. Rain beginning this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 this morning except 60 over exposed coastal sections. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
